pullRequest.body:
A set which is a chain and an antichain is subsingleton. As a result, the intersection of a chain and antichain is subsingleton.

Useful from the disproof of the Aharoniâ€“Korman conjecture, https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20082.

---
